properties.body:
EASTERN NORTH ATLANTIC.
DNC 08, DNC 19.
DISTRESS SIGNAL RECEIVED ON 406 MHZ FROM AIRCRAFT
IN 47-03.22N 012-54.19W AT 281500Z APR. VESSELS
IN VICINITY REQUESTED TO KEEP A SHARP LOOKOUT,
ASSIST IF POSSIBLE. REPORTS TO UK COAST GUARD,
PHONE: 4434 4382 0025, E-MAIL: UKMRCC@HMCG.GOV.UK.
